encyclopedia.content: 释义 excited英音：[ik'saitid] 美音：[ɪk'saɪtɪd] adj. 兴奋的；激动的；活跃的v. 激动；唤起（excite的过去分词） [比较级more excited 最高级most excited ] 它的主语是物。 同近义词 adj. 兴奋的；激动的；活跃的active, living, hot exciting 网络释义 受激 物理词汇 ... excitation voltage 激发电压 excited 受激 excited energy level 受激能级 ... 兴奋的 9* 是兴奋的 (Exci

entry.def: If you are excited, you are so happy that you cannot relax, especially because you are thinking about something pleasant that is going to happen to you.

example.ex: I'm very excited about the possibility of playing for England's first team...
example.tran: 想到可能为英格兰首屈一指的球队效力，我非常兴奋。

example.ex: I was so excited when I went to sign the paperwork I could hardly write.
example.tran: 去签文件时我非常兴奋，几乎无法写字。

entry.def: If you are excited, you are very worried or angry about something, and so you are very alert and cannot relax.

example.ex: I don't think there's any reason to get excited about inflation...
example.tran: 我认为大可不必为通货膨胀而心烦。

example.ex: Excited voices were shouting that the road was blocked by soldiers.
example.tran: 有人气愤地喊道马路被士兵封锁了。

means.word_mean: 2. of persons; excessively affected by emotion;

sentences.sentence: "he would become emotional over nothing at all"
"she was worked up about all the noise"

means.word_mean: 3. marked by uncontrolled excitement or emotion;
4. of e.g. a molecule; made reactive or more reactive

auth_sentence.content: That's one thing we're very excited about.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's one thing we're very excited about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's one thing we're very excited about.

auth_sentence.content: It wasn't easy to get excited about Intimacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: It wasn't easy to get excited about Intimacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It wasn't easy to get excited about Intimacy.

auth_sentence.content: This has me excited about space travel once again.
auth_sentence.res_content: This has me excited about space travel once again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This has me excited about space travel once again.

Sentence.sentence: The author is most excited about Inkling's notation system because one canparticipate in discussions with classmates and Facebook friends.
You sounded very excited about it!
She is excited to spend more time with her mother
Girls tend to get excited more easily than boys.

sentences.en: He was getting excited just thinking about the trip.
sentences.cn: 一想到那次旅行他就兴奋。

sentences.en: I was quite excited to hear that.
They were excited with joy at the success.
sentences.cn: 他们为成功而欣喜若狂。
